name: Ikigai Guide Notion Template
description: What is your purpose in life? Hard to tell, right? But for thousands of years, the Okinawan people knew, and they are the people who live the longest of us all. So what is their secret? Many assume that it is their Ikigai Life Philosophy, which revolves around identifying and practising your purpose throughout your lifetime. It might sound simple but sadly it's more than a journey than an instant discovery.Here is an Ikigai Guide Notion Template that will get you closer to finding out what your
features: Reflective Ikigai Questions; Automatic Ikigai Identifier Database that will allow you to test out how aligned your ideas are with the Ikigai Philosophy.; Pre-made Templates; Linked Databases

enhancedContent.overview:
The Ikigai Guide Notion Template brings the ancient Okinawan life philosophy into your digital workspace, helping you discover your purpose through the intersection of what you love, what you're good at, what the world needs, and what you can be paid for. This template transforms the abstract concept of ikigai into a practical, structured journey of self-discovery.

Rather than expecting instant enlightenment, this guide acknowledges that finding your purpose is a journey requiring reflection, experimentation, and refinement. With reflective questions, an automatic identifier database for testing alignment, and pre-made templates, it provides the scaffolding to systematically explore and validate your potential ikigai over time.

faqs.question: How do I get started with the Ikigai Guide template?
faqs.answer: After duplicating the template to your Notion workspace, begin with the reflective questions section. Work through each of the four ikigai dimensions (what you love, what you're good at, what the world needs, what you can be paid for) at a comfortable pace. As potential purposes emerge, add them to the identifier database to test their alignment. This is a journey, not a single sessionâ€”revisit and refine over weeks or months.

faqs.question: What's included in this template?
faqs.answer: The template includes comprehensive ikigai reflection questions organized by the four core dimensions, an automatic ikigai identifier database for testing and validating potential purposes, pre-made templates for exploring each dimension, linked databases that connect your insights across different areas, and a structured framework following the Okinawan ikigai philosophy practiced by some of the world's longest-living people.

faqs.question: Can I customize this for my purpose discovery process?
faqs.answer: Yes! Add your own reflection questions that resonate with your situation, customize database properties to track additional factors important to you, create custom views focused on specific life areas or career paths, adjust the identifier criteria based on your priorities, and integrate with goal-setting or career planning systems. The template provides structure while remaining flexible to your unique journey.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases for this ikigai guide?
faqs.answer: Primary use cases include discovering life purpose at any age or life stage through systematic reflection, career transition planning with purpose-alignment validation, exploring whether current work aligns with deeper meaning and fulfillment, evaluating multiple potential paths against all four ikigai dimensions, building self-awareness about authentic passions versus societal expectations, and creating a documented journey of purpose discovery that evolves over time as you gain clarity and test different possibilities.
